title: HELP! My account has been suspended for no reason
body: Received a note that my account is permanently suspended and i haven't received anything about it in my email. How can this be fixed???

replies.body: Check your junk/spam folders in case the email went there. If you still can't find it, submit a ticket to player support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asking about the suspension and they will be able to tell you what it is for.
Dont know why my account has been suspended, if any rioter would pls let me know as to why its been suspended, it would be really helpful
